thread.title: Advisers Gain Business Through Social Media
thread.title_full: Advisers Gain Business Through Social Media - WSJ

author: Veronica Dagher
title: Advisers Gain Business Through Social Media
text:
More advisers are using social media and winning business because of it.
An annual survey from Putnam Investments found that 81% of financial advisers use social media for business, up from 75% last year.
The share of advisers acquiring clients through social media jumped to 79% from 66% in 2014, the survey says.
